channel.title: lack of servers and players
channel.description: There don't seem to be many people playing and just few servers, am I missing something? Is there some place where most people play that has to be accessed by special means or is this really everything to the multiplayer community right now?

item.title: lack of servers and players
item.dc:creator: MegaKosan
item.description:
The multiplayer is kind of a meh attempt at an arena shooter at the moment.
The problem is mostly due to how movement works (not a lot of depth) and it has a few balancing issues too.

Read full topic

item.title: lack of servers and players

item.description:
